description: The Red team loses possession from a throw-in, leading to a quick counter-attack by the Blue team.
The Red team loses possession from a throw-in, leading to a quick counter-attack by the Blue team.
The red team builds an attack in the final third which results in a shot on goal. The goalkeeper makes a diving save to his right.
The referee whistles for a foul against the Claret team, awarding a free kick to the Light Blue team.
Blue team wins possession in midfield and builds an attack, passing forward into the attacking third and attempting a through ball into the penalty area.
The red team initiates a counter-attack from their own half, advancing down the right wing and taking a shot from the right side of the penalty area.
The Red team's goalkeeper takes a long goal kick downfield.
The light blue team takes a long throw-in into the red team's penalty area. The ball is headed clear by a red defender.
Red team is fouled during an attack in the opponent's half, resulting in a free kick.
The light blue team wins possession in the midfield and launches a quick counter-attack.
Blue team attempts to build an attack from a throw-in, but the red team defends and clears the danger, with play shifting to a midfield battle.
The blue team takes a corner kick from the right side. A blue player attempts a header that goes over the crossbar for a goal kick.
The Blue team wins possession in midfield and launches a counter-attack. A shot is taken by a Blue player from inside the box and the Red goalkeeper saves the shot.
Light Blue team builds an attack from the right wing, resulting in a shot that goes over the crossbar.
Light Blue team takes a free kick from the left side. The free kick is crossed into the penalty area. A Light Blue player heads the ball towards the goal, which is saved by the Red team's goalkeeper.
The light blue team attacks down the left wing, working the ball into a central position and taking a shot from outside the box that is blocked by a red defender.
Red team builds an attack from their own penalty area.  A long, direct pass is played forward, but the attack is intercepted by a headed clearance from the Light Blue defender.

The light blue team attacks in the penalty area, resulting in two quick-fire shots. A shot by a light blue player is blocked by a sliding red defender. A teammate takes a follow-up shot from the rebound and the red team's goalkeeper makes a diving save.
The Light Blue team builds an attack from their own half. A long pass is played forward into the final third. A light blue player heads the ball back towards the penalty area.
Light blue team builds an attack from the left wing. cross is played into the box.
The Blue team attacks down the left, resulting in a shot on goal that is saved by the Claret team's goalkeeper.
The blue team wins possession after a long clearance and builds an attack from their own half.
The Blue team builds a patient attack from their own half, moving the ball into the final third and probing the opposition's defense.
The red team attacks, and following a tackle in the box, they recover the loose ball and score.
Blue team defends against a Red team attack, which breaks down leading to a throw-in for the Blue team.
The red team attacks in the final third, resulting in a shot on goal that is saved by keeper.
Light Blue team attacks down the left wing into the box. Pass played into the penalty area. Shot from the edge of the box is blocked by a defender.
The blue team wins possession in the midfield and launches a long-ball attack. The red team's defender clears the ball with a header just outside the penalty area.
Light Blue team attacks down the middle, working the ball into the penalty area and taking a shot from inside the box, which goes wide of the goal.
The Red team takes an indirect free-kick which is cleared by the Light Blue team's defense.
Play is stopped for a foul on a Light Blue player, with the referee issuing a yellow card to a Claret player.
Red team's attack is cleared, leading to a Blue team counter-attack. Red player takes a shot which is blocked.  Blue team gains possession and starts a counter-attack.
Referee issues a red card to a player on the Red team during a stoppage in play.
Players warm up and walk on the sideline as a substitution is prepared. a player in a claret and blue shirt is substituted off and shakes hands with a teammate.
